text: “(velendama magin) tamange phala prayojana at kara gænime adahasinda enu æta. allah ovunta laba dun elu, gava, otuvan adi dæya ohuge suddha vu namaya pavasa, niyamita dinayanhi khella kapa kurban kirima sandahada, (ehi pæminenu æta. ebævin ese kurban karana lada) evayen obat anubhava karanu. duppatuntada, daridratavayen pelennan adi ayatada laba denu
